title: Typophile's Type-ID Maestro Is One Year Older!
content:
Throwing out a quick, but very deserved Happy Birthday to Yves Peters. A man among men we have here who is not only a great type ID’er but an all around great guy! Take it easy man and enjoy your day!

 [‹ Custom type examples are back at Font Bureau site](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30421 "Go to previous forum topic") [Slogan ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30413 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dave bailey

comments.content:
Yves! Happy Birthday Dude!

Keep on dancin’

ChrisL

Yeah — way to go, Yves!

Gefeliciteerd en een voorspoedig nieuwjaar!

_Reeeally ?_

Happiest Birthday, Mr Type ID :)  
_Yyyeeeaaa, [Yves](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Yves%20Peters)_

Dav

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/62620.gif)

Happy Birthday, Yves. Thanks for all you do make Typophile a great place to hang out.

Marc O

Congratulations.

Héctor
Happy Birthday, Yves! Best wishes for a wonderful year and many more to come! Thanks for all your ID help!

A very Happy Birthday, Yves!  
You’re a _Moderator Extraordinaire_!
Happy Birthday, Yves! Hopefully, I’ll see you on the dance floor this summer! ;)

Bon anniversaire Yves et que l’année qui vient soit excellente. Aussi, un grand merci pour ta disponibilité.  
; ^)
Happy Birthday, Yves!
Happy Birthday
Happy Birthday!
Happy 44 Yves! :-D

Thankoo thankoo thankoo everyone _(except you, Peter, you bastid!)_ :^D

All in a day’s work, it’s my pleasure, really.

When Nona heard about this thread she was so happy she tried to jump straight out of her bath to give y’all a big wet kiss.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Nona_bath.jpg)

Belated Birthday best wishes.  
Tim
feliz cumpleaños!

Nothing like wet, slippery babies to brighten your day! Give Nona a big squeeze for us.

ChrisL
All the best to one of the best.
Happy Birthday, Yves!
Happy Birthday Yves!

There once was a rocker, designer and writer named Yves,  
and for him, type identity was as a breeze.  
Yet for all of his trouble and his labor in the forums,  
He receives nothing for pay, not even brie.

May you have many more glorious years! (Which might happen  
if I stop writing limericks!)

ooh. Can’t resist a limerick.

There once was a drummer from Gent  
That id’d type without earning a cent  
His friends might call him Yvesie,  
but Illegal type is was get’s him bent.

hmm. Can’t think of anything else.

There once was a drummer  
who wasn’t a strummer

oh well.

Happy Belatedly Public Greetings To You On Your Birthday.

:^)
Best wishes, Yves!
Wow, your daughter is über cute man! You could have kids graduating from college though if you started young like my parents....what a different world you’d be in. She looks like a lot of fun though!

You are good not only at type but at rhyming as well!! :)  
Happy Birthday to Yves&best wishes from me, too :))

You could have kids graduating from college though if you started young like my parents….what a different world you’d be in.

That’s the problem when there’s a significant difference of age between partners — I was 28, but Sabine was only 21 when we had our first daughter. And then of course we thought we’d stop at two but decided to have a third one 6 years after our son. :^)

Oooh. Can’t resist a limerick.

Damn straight:

_There once was a drummer from Belgium  
Who had way too much type in his cranium.  
Whenever that nutter saw fonts  
He simply **had** to I.D. ’em._

Just when he thought he’d go senile  
He found this site called Typophile.  
Everyone talked the same language.  
He knew resistance was futile.

Third verse to come — limericks in English are hard for me. ;^)
As long as you’re happy, man! Catch you on AIM later!
hope it was happy!

Here’s one more for ya:

There still is a brilliant type IDer  
Whose forum could just not be tidier  
With the time that he spends  
Forget swords or pens  
It’s truly Yves’ mouse that is mightier!

Happy belated!

Due to his tireless work, this site enhances  
Not to mention the guy also breakdances  
What you may not know about Yves  
Is that his name rhymes with Steve  
For his birthday, we all drop our pantses!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122103327im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pv_212638304d3c3b91eafa81cf38cf0d566b6b9292.jpg)

What the!? I’m NOT forty-four yet!!! :^D :^D :^D

_Grrr, next time I see Peter... He’s in for a good a$$-whuppin’!_

Stephen,  
Outstanding mag cover!

ChrisL
Hey, that’s the one from last year!?! :^D

Happy Birthday AGAIN!!! :-)

Yves might feel like he has been watching the movie “Groundhog Day” from seeing this revival :-P

ChrisL
Wot?? Innit? Happy Birthday Yvesie!

_Hey, that’s the one from last year!?! :^D_

Once you reach 39, it’s always the same birthday over and over and over.... ;-)

Have a happy (and as an old friend of mine used to say “and if you can’t have a ’happy’ have a ’safe’”!
